content: If you are not here because youhave my CV and you would like to get in touch, you can find me on Twitter and Instagram where I post frequently.

pages.name: Crowdicity
content: As front-end developer I was hired to help rebuild the platform from the ground up using modern techniques with React, Redux, Enzyme, and Sass. The goal was to develop well a well-tested, scalable and performant multi-lingual platform which respects global data-privacy laws.
I have also worked with Vue, Vuex, and PHP whilst maintaining and extending the legacy environment.

pages.name: See Tickets
content: See Tickets sells tickets to concerts, festivals, exhibitions, and sporting events.

During my time at See Tickets I developed hundreds of white-label e-commerce sites; managed high traffic sales with tens of thousands of concurrent users; built multi-lingual bespoke solutions for ballots, registration systems, auctions and more.
I have produced sites for the BBC, Glastonbury Festivals, The Lawn Tennis Association, Banksy, Louis Vuitton.

pages.name: Github
content: View the source for this site on Github.
